title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 496.4 - Statewide greenhouse gas emission limits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 496.4 - Statewide greenhouse gas emission limits

State Regulations
(a) For the purposes of this Part, the
estimated level of statewide greenhouse gas emissions in 1990 is 409.78 million
metric tons of carbon dioxide equivalent, using a GWP20 as provided in section
496.5
of this Part. (b) For the purposes of this Part, the table
below establishes statewide emission limits for the year specified, as a
percentage of estimated 1990 statewide greenhouse gas emissions of 60 percent
and 15 percent, respectively, measured in millions of metric tons of carbon
dioxide equivalent gas using a GWP20 as provided in section
496.5
of this Part. Year

Statewide greenhouse gas emission limit
(in million metric tons of carbon dioxide equivalent)
2030
245.87
2050
61.47

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
496.4

Adopted

New

York State Register December 30, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 52, eff. 12/30/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
